verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
This <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be unto you the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of <S%H2320>months<s%>: it shall be the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> to you.

¶ <S%H1696>Speak<s%> ye unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of this <S%H2320>month<s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> to them every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%>, according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for an <S%H1004>house<s%>:

And if the <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> too <S%H4591>little<s%> for the <S%H7716>lamb<s%>, let him and his <S%H7934>neighbour<s%> <S%H7138>next<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> it according to the <S%H4373>number<s%> of the <S%H5315>souls<s%>; every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating<s%> shall make your <S%H3699>count<s%> for the <S%H7716>lamb<s%>.

Your <S%H7716>lamb<s%> shall be without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, a <S%H2145>male<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>: ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> it out from the <S%H3532>sheep<s%>, or from the <S%H5795>goats<s%>:

And ye shall <S%H4931>keep<s%> it up until the <S%H702%H6240>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the same <S%H2320>month<s%>: and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H996>in<s%> the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H5414>strike<s%> it on the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts<s%> and on the upper door <S%H4947>post<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses<s%>, wherein they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

And they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in that <S%H3915>night<s%>, <S%H6748>roast<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>; and with <S%H4844>bitter<s%> herbs they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

<S%H398>Eat<s%> not of it <S%H4995>raw<s%>, nor <S%H1310%H1311>sodden<s%> at all with <S%H4325>water<s%>, but <S%H6748>roast<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>; his <S%H7218>head<s%> with his <S%H3767>legs<s%>, and with the <S%H7130>purtenance<s%> thereof.

And ye shall let nothing of it <S%H3498>remain<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; and that which <S%H3498>remaineth<s%> of it until the <S%H1242>morning<s%> ye shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3602>thus<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> it; with your <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%>, your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and your <S%H4731>staff<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in <S%H2649>haste<s%>: it is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6453>passover<s%>.

For I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> this <S%H3915>night<s%>, and will <S%H5221>smite<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>; and against all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgment<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be to you for a <S%H226>token<s%> upon the <S%H1004>houses<s%> where ye are: and when I <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, I will <S%H6452>pass<s%> over you, and the <S%H5063>plague<s%> shall not be upon you to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> you, when I <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And this <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be unto you for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%>; and ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>; ye shall keep it a <S%H2287>feast<s%> by an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>; <S%H389>even<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall put <S%H7673>away<s%> <S%H7603>leaven<s%> out of your <S%H1004>houses<s%>: for whosoever <S%H398>eateth<s%> leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> until the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>, and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> to you; no manner of <S%H4399>work<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> in them, <S%H389>save<s%> that which every <S%H5315>man<s%> must <S%H398>eat<s%>, that only may be <S%H6213>done<s%> of you.

And ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> the feast of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>; for in this <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> have I <S%H3318>brought<s%> your <S%H6635>armies<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: therefore shall ye <S%H8104>observe<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%> by an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

¶ In the <S%H7223>first<s%> month, on the <S%H6240%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, until the <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall there be no <S%H7603>leaven<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H1004>houses<s%>: for whosoever <S%H398>eateth<s%> that which is <S%H2556>leavened<s%>, even that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whether he be a <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, or <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> nothing <S%H2556>leavened<s%>; in all your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Draw <S%H4900>out<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> you a <S%H6629>lamb<s%> according to your <S%H4940>families<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H92>bunch<s%> of <S%H231>hyssop<s%>, and <S%H2881>dip<s%> it in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is in the <S%H5592>bason<s%>, and <S%H5060>strike<s%> the <S%H4947>lintel<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is in the <S%H5592>bason<s%>; and <S%H376>none<s%> of you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> to <S%H5062>smite<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>; and when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4947>lintel<s%>, and on the <S%H8147>two<s%> side <S%H4201>posts<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will pass <S%H6452>over<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%>, and will not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> the <S%H7843>destroyer<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> in unto your <S%H1004>houses<s%> to <S%H5062>smite<s%> you.
And ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> for an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> to thee and to thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, when ye be <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you, according as he hath <S%H1696>promised<s%>, that ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> this <S%H5656>service<s%>.
And it shall come to pass, when your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto you, What mean ye by this <S%H5656>service<s%>?

That ye shall <S%H559>say<s%>, It is the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6453>passover<s%>, who <S%H6452>passed<s%> over the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, when he <S%H5062>smote<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> our <S%H1004>houses<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> bowed the <S%H6915>head<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3212>away<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

¶ And it came to pass, that at <S%H2677%H3915>midnight<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne<s%> unto the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H7628>captive<s%> that was in the <S%H1004%H953>dungeon<s%>; and all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>cattle<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, he, and all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and all the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>; and there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; for there was not a <S%H1004>house<s%> where there was not one <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, and get you <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, both ye and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as ye have <S%H1696>said<s%>.
Also <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds<s%>, as ye have <S%H1696>said<s%>, and be <S%H3212>gone<s%>; and <S%H1288>bless<s%> me also.

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> were <S%H2388>urgent<s%> upon the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they might <S%H7971>send<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H4116>haste<s%>; for they <S%H559>said<s%>, We be all <S%H4191>dead<s%> men.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> their <S%H1217>dough<s%> before it was <S%H2556>leavened<s%>, their <S%H4863>kneadingtroughs<s%> being bound <S%H6887>up<s%> in their <S%H8071>clothes<s%> upon their <S%H7926>shoulders<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; and they <S%H7592>borrowed<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H8071>raiment<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favour<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, so that they <S%H7592>lent<s%> unto them such things as they required. And they <S%H5337>spoiled<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses<s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> on <S%H7273>foot<s%> that were <S%H1397>men<s%>, <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H2945>children<s%>.
And a <S%H6154>mixed<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> also with them; and <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and <S%H1241>herds<s%>, even <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%>.

And they <S%H644>baked<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> of the <S%H1217>dough<s%> which they brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, for it was not <S%H2556>leavened<s%>; because they were thrust <S%H1644>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H4102>tarry<s%>, neither had they <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for themselves any <S%H6720>victual<s%>.

¶ Now the <S%H4186>sojourning<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, was <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967%H8141>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967%H8141>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, even the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> it came to pass, that all the <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

It is a <S%H3915>night<s%> to be much <S%H8107>observed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H3318>bringing<s%> them out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: this is that <S%H3915>night<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to be <S%H8107>observed<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, This is the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover<s%>: There shall no <S%H1121%H5236>stranger<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof:
But every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> that is <S%H4736>bought<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>, when thou hast <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> him, then shall he <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.
A <S%H8453>foreigner<s%> and an hired <S%H7916>servant<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

In <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall it be <S%H398>eaten<s%>; thou shalt not carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> ought of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%>; neither shall ye <S%H7665>break<s%> a <S%H6106>bone<s%> thereof.
All the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it.

And when a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> shall <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> with thee, and will <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, let all his <S%H2145>males<s%> be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%>, and then let him come <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H6213>keep<s%> it; and he shall be as one that is <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>: for no uncircumcised <S%H6189>person<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.
<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> shall be to him that is <S%H249>homeborn<s%>, and unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you.
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

And it came to pass the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did <S%H3318>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies<s%>.
